member.summary: Whether this is the last batch.

member.name: T:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter
member.summary: Allows you to restrict the results to servers running a certain game.

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.GameDirectory
member.summary: Servers running the specified modification.(ex. cstrike)

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.IsLinux
member.summary: Servers running on a Linux platform.

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.NAppId
member.summary: Servers that are NOT running a game(AppId)(This was introduced to block Left 4 Dead games from the Steam Server Browser).

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.Tags
member.summary: Servers with all of the given tag(s) in sv_tags(separated by comma).

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.HiddenTagsAll
member.summary: Servers with all of the given tag(s) in their 'hidden' tags (L4D2)(separated by comma).

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.HiddenTagsAny
member.summary: Servers with any of the given tag(s) in their 'hidden' tags (L4D2)(separated by comma).

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.AppId
member.summary: Servers that are running game that has mentioned Application Id.

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.IsUniqueIPAddress
member.summary: Return only one server for each unique IP address matched.

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.IPAddress
member.summary: Return only servers on the specified End Point(Port is optional).

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.ExcludeAny
member.summary: Exclude servers that match any of the mentioned conditions(Nor filter).

member.name: P:QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter.ExcludeAll
member.summary: Exclude servers that match all of the mentioned conditions(Nand filter).

member.summary: Returns an instance of that provides event and filtering mechanism.

member.summary: Gets the appropriate masterserver query instance

Called on every attempt made to fetch batch.

member.name: T:QueryMaster.MasterServer.BatchReceivedCallback
member.summary: Invoked when addressess are received from master server.

member.name: M:QueryMaster.MasterServer.Server.GetAddresses(QueryMaster.MasterServer.Region,QueryMaster.MasterServer.BatchReceivedCallback,QueryMaster.MasterServer.IpFilter,System.Int32,QueryMaster.ErrorCallback)
member.summary: Starts receiving socket addresses of servers.
member.param: The region of the world that you wish to find servers in.
Called when a batch of Socket addresses are received.
Used to set filter on the type of server required.
Number of batches to fetch.-1 would return all addressess.(1 batch = 1 udppacket = 231 addressess).

member.name: M:QueryMaster.MasterServer.Server.GetNextBatch(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.param: Number of batches to fetch.-1 would return all addressess.(1 batch = 1 udppacket = 231 addressess).
Whether to clear internal state and obtain addresses from start.

member.summary: Provides methods to access server using rcon password.

member.name: M:QueryMaster.GameServer.Rcon.SendCommand(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Whether the reply could be/is larger than 1400 bytes.
Called on every attempt made to send a command.
member.returns: Reply from server in string format.

member.name: M:QueryMaster.GameServer.Rcon.AddlogAddress(System.String,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Add a client socket to server's logaddress list.

member.name: M:QueryMaster.GameServer.Rcon.RemovelogAddress(System.String,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Delete a client socket from server's logaddress list.

member.name: T:QueryMaster.GameServer.ServerQuery
member.summary: Provides methods to create Server instance.

member.name: M:QueryMaster.GameServer.ServerQuery.GetServerInstance(QueryMaster.EngineType,System.String,System.UInt16,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns an object that represents the server
member.param: Obsolete Gold Source servers reply only to half life protocol.if set to true then it would use half life protocol.If set to null,then protocol is identified at runtime[Default : false].
Number of times to retry if first attempt fails.
member.returns: Instance of server class that represents the connected server.
